item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:94 Chances: Oracle Corp. has been named a Leader in the 2023 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Configure, Price, and Quote Applications for the seventh consecutive year, indicating strong performance in this segment. The company’s strong new operations contribute to its potential continued success.
